p:
The secondary outcomes include the number or proportion of persons retained at each cascade step (see also Fig. 1 and Additional file 2 ):
HIV diagnosis (UNAIDS 90-90-90 treatment target)
Linkage to pre-ART care
Retention in pre-ART care
On ART (UNAIDS 90-90-90 treatment target) with
Start of ART
Retention on ART
Suppression of viral load (UNAIDS 90-90-90 treatment target)
